behaviour.feedbackOnCorrect: Correct! Widespread use of computer-aided translation tools has meant that post-editing is now just another aspect of a translator's work.
behaviour.feedbackOnWrong: Incorrect. Widespread use of computer-aided translation tools has meant that post-editing is now just another aspect of a translator's work.

l10n.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?
